member.name: P:AdvancedHMIDrivers.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Restituisce l'istanza di ResourceManager nella cache utilizzata da questa classe.

member.name: P:AdvancedHMIDrivers.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Esegue l'override della proprietà CurrentUICulture del thread corrente per tutte le ricerche di risorse eseguite utilizzando questa classe di risorse fortemente tipizzata.

member.name: T:AdvancedHMIDrivers.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Classe di risorse fortemente tipizzata per la ricerca di stringhe localizzate e così via.

member.name: M:AdvancedHMIDrivers.EthernetIPforCLXComm.ReadAny(System.String)

member.name: M:AdvancedHMIDrivers.EthernetIPforCLXComm.WriteData(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Write a single integer value to a PLC data table The startAddress is in the common form of AB addressing (e.g. N7:0)

member.summary: Write multiple consectutive integer values to a PLC data table The startAddress is in the common form of AB addressing (e.g. N7:0)

member.name: M:AdvancedHMIDrivers.DF1Comm.DetectCommSettings
member.summary: This method is intended to make it easy to configure the comm port settings. It is similar to the auto configure in RSLinx. A successful configuration returns a 0 and sets the properties to the discovered values. It will fire the event "AutoDetectTry" for each setting attempt It uses the echo command and sends the character "A", then checks if it received a response.
